data.oai_dc:dc: Dispersal kernel parameters predicted means (standard deviation and maximum)

Calculates standard deviation and maximum for random samples of 6 individuals per status in each array. Fits linear mixed model to these data and extracts predicted means for some treatment combinations.
informed dispersal|condition dependence|phenotype dependence|juvenile environment|Tribolium castaneum|red flour beetles|density-dependent dispersal|colonization|neighbors|social environment
